scenes.action_text: THE DAMNED UNITED Written by Peter Morgan From the novel by David Peace 1 EXT. ELLAND ROAD - DAY - (1974) 1 Heavy leaden skies over the arachnoid stands and floodlights of Elland Road stadium: home to Leeds United football club. And rain. Sheets of angry, Yorkshire rain. TITLE: "THE DAMNED UNITED" 2 INT. BOARDROOM - ELLAND ROAD - DAY - (1974) 2 Flashlights pop as DON REVIE, (late 40
